channel.title: indysymphony on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in indysymphony on Ross A. Baker

item.description: Tonight the Indianapolis Symphony Orchestra performed Pavel Haas' unfinished symphony in its North American premier. It was unfinished because the composer was murdered in Auschwitz. Some premieres are moving, and some premieres are obscure for a reason. This was moving, and I hope it's heard in your city someday. #IndySymphony #Indianapolis #ClassicalMusic

If I'm the entire overlap of the Fediverse and Indianapolis Symphony Orchestra patrons, does that mean I get to create the hashtag? Anyway, nice #Brahms Piano Conerto No. 2 tonight by the #IndySymphony and Stephen Hough. #ClassicalMusic
